item.title: 8 Ideas to Save Christmas in Ferguson
item.description: Nixon buck-passed while Ferguson burned. With the city’s main business district laid to rubble, buycotts won’t have much effect. And Christmas is around the corner. Who got hurt last night? *1. People who own businesses *2. People who work at businesses *3. People who rely on businesses Time is short. The people affected by last night’s riots need help rebuilding and jobs right now. While I don’t have complete plans, I can throw out eight ideas.

item.title: Missouri News Round Up
item.description: Lefty Blogger Political Incest Since the November elections, Missouri state government has been infested with former left-wing bloggers, according to 24th State. More news on the revolving door between FiredUp and Nixon/Carnahan junta to follow on 24th State blog. Conservative Heartland Leadership Conference Dana Loesch and Bill Hennessy were privileged to participate in a Social Media Marketing panel at theConservative Heartland Leadership Conference held at the Millennium Hotel June 3 and 4.
